text: “(ada dina pasutævili vi) obava, obama ninda kara gænimata vada allahge avamanaya(da kopayada) itamat visalava tikhenu æta. mandayat oba visvasaya desata aradhana karanu læbu avasthavedi, (eya) pratiksepa kara hæriyehuya” yayi niyata vasayenma kavurun (allahva) pratiksepa kara hæriyoda, ovunta kiyanu læbe
